column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Originally i would tell people this was a "bar that served food"....then i actually sat down and ate dinner here. Wow! Not only is it a spectacular whiskey bar
column2: but the food is highly developed comfort food suitable for the best foodies in Houston. The meat loaf app is so yummy
column3: deep fried cubes of meat loaf with a sweet red sauce to dip them in. and the only burger on the menu looks good enough....however
column4: the waiter told me to order it "the chef's way" which i did and it blew me away! Ive also had the breakfast item on the dinner menu
column5: a iron skillet pancake with whiskey maple syrup topped with an egg and bacon! there are lots of tvs with sports playing all throughout the restaurant
column6: it can be noisy but its so good i don't care!
